titles.title: Social Security Disability Insurance and Unemployment Benefits Double Dip Elimination Act
Social Security Disability Insurance and Unemployment Benefits Double Dip Elimination Act
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to prevent concurrent receipt of unemployment benefits and Social Security disability insurance, and for other purposes.
Social Security Disability Insurance and Unemployment Benefits Double Dip Elimination Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
